channel.title: Comments on: Episode #170: A New Kind of Legal

item.title: By: Christy
item.dc:creator: Christy
item.description: You are absolutely correct about the use issue. I have spent my BTC but then I get scared that I’m spending something that is going to be worth millions. Maybe what changes the model is the BTC has to be classified as currency instead of an asset.
item.content:encoded: You are absolutely correct about the use issue. I have spent my BTC but then I get scared that I’m spending something that is going to be worth millions. Maybe what changes the model is the BTC has to be classified as currency instead of an asset.
